me.arsenalfcgunners.maintenance

Class MaintenanceListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.arsenalfcgunners.maintenance.MaintenanceListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class MaintenanceListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Author:
    arsenalfcgunners Listens for a player joining, or a server getting pinged.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MaintenanceListener(Maintenance plugin) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pingServer(org.bukkit.event.server.ServerListPingEvent e)
      Listens for the server getting pinged and changes the motd if the server is in maintenance.
      void playerJoin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent e)
      Listens for a player joining and kicks them or sends them back to hub if the server is in maintenance mode and they do not have the permission "gapple.dev" or are whitelisted.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaintenanceListener

        public MaintenanceListener(Maintenance plugin)
        Parameters:
        plugin - The maintenance plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • playerJoin

        public void playerJoin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent e)
        Listens for a player joining and kicks them or sends them back to hub if the server is in maintenance mode and they do not have the permission "gapple.dev" or are whitelisted. They are sent to the hub if the server is not the hub. If the server is the hub they are kicked from the network.
        Parameters:
        e - The event.

      • pingServer

        public void pingServer(org.bukkit.event.server.ServerListPingEvent e)
        Listens for the server getting pinged and changes the motd if the server is in maintenance. If the server is not in maintenacne it sets it back to the previous motd.
        Parameters:
        e - The event.
